duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide medical care and treatment to animals, including wellness examinations, radiographs, surgery, and dental health.
Utilize acupuncture, herbs, food energetics, cold laser, and PEMF therapies to manage and improve pet's health.
Integrate Western Medicine with Eastern Philosophy in the treatment of pets.
Conduct comprehensive examinations and diagnoses to develop personalized treatment plans for each pet.
Engage in continuous learning and development to stay updated with the latest medical advancements in animal care.
Educate and guide pet owners on pet health management and wellness, including nutrition and lifestyle recommendations.
Collaborate with a diverse team to provide integrated care and support for pets.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) degree from an accredited veterinary school.
